ro.auth.forgot_link: Ați uitat numele de utilizator sau parola?
ro.auth.forgot.email_help: Introduceti adresa de e-mail de pe contul dumneavoastă și vă vom trimite datele de autentificare prin e-mail.
ro.auth.forgot.heading: Recuperarea datelor de autentificare
ro.auth.forgot.invalid_email_error_html: Hmm, acea adresă de e-mail nu este in sistemul nostru. Poate că nu te-ai înregistrat încă?
ro.auth.forgot.sent.body_html: Am trimis datele de înregistrare prin adresa de e-mail înregistrată.
ro.auth.join.almost.body_html:
Înainte de a te conecta la Game Jolt, trebuie să verifici adresa de e-mail a contului tău.

Am trimis un e-mail cu instrucțiunile de activare ale contului tău.
ro.You found a secret! But upon further ins: You found a secret! But on further inspection, you realize it's just an empty page.
ro.Check your Internet connection and try a: Check your Internet connection and try again.
ro.Could not set the platform for some reas: Could not set the platform for some reason.
ro.This allows you to disable right mouse c: Această setare va opri apăsarea de dreapta pe pagina ta. Pornește-o doar dacă jocul tău trebuie să oprească apăsarea de dreapta.
ro.Disable right click?: Ești sigur că vrei să oprești apăsarea de dreapta?

ro.You've published your game to the site!: You've published your game to the site! Huzzah! Remember to spread the word...

ro.Learn more about choosing a good version: Citește mai multe despre alegerea unui bun număr de versiune...
ro.Are you sure you want to publish this re: Are you sure you want to publish this release? All of its builds will become active on your game page.
ro.The release is now active on your game p: The release is now active on your game page.
ro.Are you sure you want to remove this rel: Are you sure you want to remove this release? All of its builds will be removed as well.
ro.The release and its builds have been rem: The release and its builds have been removed from the package.
ro.Are you sure you want to hide this relea: Are you sure you want to hide this release? It will no longer be accessible from your game page.
ro.The release has been unpublished and is: The release has been unpublished and is now hidden.
ro.Are you sure you want to permanently rem: Are you sure you want to permanently remove your game?
ro.Your game has been removed from the site: Your game has been removed from the site. Maybe a phoenix will rise in its place one day.
